# Extra Secret of the Stone
## Overview
You have listened to the stones and they have taught you to tap more often into your power to create magical effects.

## Effects
You gain the following benefit:

- You gain 3 additional uses of [[Secrets of the Stone|secrets of the stone]] that you can freely distribute among your individual uses of known [[Secrets of the Stone|secrets of the stone]] when taking a long rest. You could, for example grant one secret of the stone +3 uses, or grant one +1 use and another +2 uses.
